document_data.name: Yu Fu Fang
document_data.mainbody: '''Yu Fu Fang''' was a [[barbarian]] in [[Shou Lung]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Yu Fu lived near the [[Hungtse River]]. He fished with trained cormorants and a magic flute that called fish to his boat. He was a wonder of the local fish market, always having many kinds of fish and rare delicacies. Sometimes, for his friends, Yu Fu also built boats.
